20101208044103.000|20101208044105.000|CCO|PUNISHMENT, A SPIRITUAL LEADER 
20101208044105.000|20101208044107.000|CCO|ACCUSED OF COERCING YOUNG MEN 
20101208044107.000|20101208044109.000|CCO|INTO SEXUAL RELATIONSHIPS HAS 
20101208044109.000|20101208044111.000|CCO|AGREED TO TRY TO AVOID A TRIAL 
20101208044111.000|20101208044112.250|CCO|AND INSTEAD UNDERGO MEDIATION.
20101208044112.250|20101208044113.500|CCO|EDDIE LONG TOLD HIS CHEERING 
20101208044113.500|20101208044114.750|CCO|CONGREGATION HE WAS GOING TO

20101208044118.500|20101208044119.750|CCO|CHANGED.
20101208044119.750|20101208044121.000|CCO|JOE JOHNS TONIGHT HAS DETAILS.
20101208044121.000|20101208044123.000|CCO|>> Reporter: CHARGES OF 
20101208044123.000|20101208044125.000|CCO|HYPOCRISY, THE MARRIED MINISTER

20101208044127.000|20101208044129.000|CCO|BAPTIST CHURCH WHO HAS BEEN

20101208044131.000|20101208044133.000|CCO|LESBIANS IS ACTUALLY ACCUSE OF 
20101208044133.000|20101208044135.000|CCO|LIVING LIFE ON THE DOWN LOW, 
20101208044135.000|20101208044137.000|CCO|SECRETLY ENGAGING IN GAY SEX 
20101208044137.000|20101208044139.000|CCO|HIMSELF.

20101208044141.000|20101208044144.333|CCO|>> I HAVE NEVER IN MY LIFE 
20101208044144.333|20101208044147.667|CCO|PORTRAYED MYSELF AS A PERFECT 
20101208044147.667|20101208044151.000|CCO|MAN.

20101208044513.857|20101208044515.286|CCO|>> WELL, MEDIATION IS USUALLY 
20101208044515.286|20101208044516.714|CCO|USED, AND IT'S OFTEN USED IN
